dialogue.introduction: Destroyer Takanami of the Yuugumo-class will give her best this time! Really, probably!
dialogue.library_intro: I'm Takanami, the sixth Yuugumo-class Destroyer. Born in Uraga.  I was assigned to the 31st Destroyer Division, and I had done my part well.  On a fateful night battle at Lunga Point, as the Leadship of the Lookouts squad, our crew first spotted the enemy fleet... and that may have brought victory to the battle... Yup!
dialogue.secretary2: Commander? Maybe... did you call for Takanami?
dialogue.secretary3: Hya wa! U-Um, I was incredibly startled so... please aprroach me in a different way... Um... maybe it's... better.
dialogue.secretaryidle: Drum cans, Drum cans... Oh, we have them. Me? I might not be equipping those, because I'm the leading look out ship! What? What you mean by that? Um... I don't know
dialogue.secretarymarried: Commander, are you a little tired? Just wait a moment, Takanami will put in some Tea! Yes, it's Japanese Tea! Commander, just take a little rest!
dialogue.wedding: Commander, is it true that you need to talk to me? What? This box for Takanami? Am I allowed to open.. it? Wow, it's beautiful, is this for real, for reals?
dialogue.show_players_score: Commander, report time right? Yup, right away.
dialogue.joining_a_fleet: Destroyer Takanami of the Yuugumo-class, going... maybe.
dialogue.equipment2: With this... with this I can maybe fight!
dialogue.supply: Maybe I'm happy... with these precious supplies.
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: I'm sorry, I might need the bath.
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: I'm sorry. Looks like my bath will take longer this time...
dialogue.ship_construction: Commander, a new ally has arrived.
dialogue.start_a_sortie: Destroyer Takanami, member of Torpedo Squadron no.2, going!
dialogue.battle_start: Enemy fleet spotted! Maybe we need to press our advantage now... Please follow me!
dialogue.attack: Takanami might show you the increased fire power! Aiming... Fire!
dialogue.night_battle: It's probably a night battle... But I am no longer lost. Takanami, attacking! Please follow me!
dialogue.mvp: Takanami was helpful? Really? Yay, maybe I'm happy... for real.
dialogue.minor_damaged2: H-Hya~... Are you ok? Can you fight?
dialogue.moderately_damaged: N-No... concentrated fire? Maybe I can still go on. Maybe I'll sink? No, don't sink!
dialogue.sunk: Looks like I'm getting concentrated fire again... Maybe lighting the enemy ships... was also helpful... Commander...
dialogue.rainy_season_2015: The rainy days continue... maybe. Still, rainy days are quiet and nice, aren't they? Takanami, might like it.
dialogue.early_summer_2015: It's been getting hotter, hasn't it? Maybe it'll be... summer soon. Commander, aren't you perhaps feeling hot?
dialogue.midsummer_2015: It's summer, Commander. I may want to eat some red beans on ice. Mamiya-san... Ah, I'll serve it!
dialogue.christmas_2015: Merry Christmas, commander... I think. Here, I bought you a present... I think.
dialogue.end_of_year_2015: It's that time already. I will do my very best for the homeport's spring cleaning... I think. Yes!
dialogue.setsubun_2016: Naganami, about these beans... Eh, You you think you want me to throw it? E-Eii! Like this...?

hourly.0000: Admiral! I, Takanami might announce the time today. Ah! We just passed 0:00 AM!
hourly.0100: Maybe it's... 1... AM! Eh? That first part is confusing? Y-yes...but...
hourly.0200: Maybe it's 2... AM! Ah? It's okay? I'm sorry it's a bad habit. Yup.
hourly.0300: Maybe it's 3... AM. I'm sleepy. Ah, but I'll be fine, really!
hourly.0400: Maybe it's 4... AM. It's early morning already. It's the darkest around this time... probably.
hourly.0500: 5:00. Morning have come. Commander, good morning!
hourly.0600: Maybe it's... 6:00 AM. Everybody, good morning! It's morning!
hourly.0700: 7:00. I might have brought breakfast. Today we have miso soup with green leaves...
hourly.0800: Maybe it's 8:00 AM. Ah, Naganami-neesama! G-Good morning!
hourly.0900: Maybe it's 9:00 AM. Naganami-neesama? Yup! She's my prideful sister!
hourly.1000: 10:00. It's probably time for... practice? Yes, roger that!
hourly.1100: Maybe it's 11:00 AM. Commander, it's time for lunch. What do you want?
hourly.1200: 12:00. 'As for lunch, you can ask Mamiya-san for a treat'? Yay, I'm happy!
hourly.1300: 13:00. *nom nom*. Mamiya's omurice is delicious! *nom nom*
hourly.1400: 14:00 Next expedition might be... Tokyo Express? Eh... ah... it's... nothing...
hourly.1500: 15:0... Ah! Naganami-neesama! Eh? Refreshment? Thanks you!
hourly.1600: 16:00. I received cookies from Naganami-neesama! For now, I'll brew some tea
hourly.1700: 17:00. Such a wonderful sunset...! The sun might set at any moment. It might looks pretty.
hourly.1800: Maybe it's 18:00 PM. Commander, Takanami need to prepare dinner? Yup!
hourly.1900: 19:00. Dinner's preparation is probably done. We have Fricandeau Beef today...
hourly.2000: Maybe it's 20:00. Commander, do you want another dish of... Takanami's Fricandeau Beef...?
hourly.2100: 21:00. Maybe it's night. Commander, I'll brew some tea again, yup!
hourly.2200: 22:00. That Light Cruiser sister... Eh? Maybe I should just... leave her be...?
hourly.2300: 23:00. Commander, good work today... probably. Yup!
